name: Save the Sun (Lymptx)
description:
An Indie Game, made for the Games Off 2020 Game Jam.  Created by Benjamin Winkler and Robin Walz.

Aliens have stolen the sun and have hidden it in their spaceship, broken into pieces. Your mission is to use their technology against them to get it back. - and Save the Sun

Play Game again: Press M in Level Select. (Deletes all your progress)

Github:

Github repository: https://github.com/Lymptx/Save-the-Sun
